scripts.create-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ inboundLane/pangoro
scripts.remove-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ inboundLane/pangoro
scripts.deploy-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 inboundLane/pangoro
scripts.create-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ inboundLane/goerli
scripts.remove-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ inboundLane/goerli
scripts.deploy-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 inboundLane/goerli
